title: How does one make a character sound like a yandere? - Quora

response.answer_text: Give them the split personality of what a Yandere is—-an example would be a loving, caring parent who turns into a raving, mean, abusive lunatic after a few drinks. Put yourself in the shoes of the person, drop all your perceived thoughts of “right,” and Make yourself that spit-personality wackjob! Send me the first chapter….. What’s most important to me is Her Reaction to this advance.

A2A, God knows why The best I can say about this is that in my very limited experience with anime, these sorts of characters’ voices are usually high-pitched and almost comically sexual in inflection. Also, I just want to add that the behaviour you've described isn't so much “[blurring] the line between a normal sibling relationship” as much as it is crossing said line. But hey, maybe my standard of sibling behaviour is atypical.
